TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlArrayItemAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 表示屬性，這個屬性會指定 可置於序列化陣列中的衍生型別。

span.span: Represents an attribute that specifies the derived types that the can place in a serialized array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬於一系列屬性可控制如何序列化或還原序列化物件。The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object. 相似的屬性完整清單，請參閱 < [ 屬性控制 XML 序列化的](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md). 您可以套用任何公用讀取/寫入成員傳回陣列，或提供其中一個存取權。You can apply the to any public read/write member that returns an array, or provides access to one. 例如，傳回物件的陣列，集合中，欄位，或任何實作類別介面。For example, a field that returns an array of objects, a collection, an , or any class that implements the interface. 支援多型，也就是說，它可讓將衍生的物件新增至陣列。The supports polymorphism--in other words, it allows the to add derived objects to an array. 例如，假設名為類別`Mammal`衍生自基底類別，名為`Animal`。For example, suppose a class named `Mammal` is derived from a base class named `Animal`. 進一步假設類別名為`MyAnimals`包含的欄位，傳回的陣列`Animal`物件。Further suppose that a class named `MyAnimals` contains a field that returns an array of `Animal` objects. 若要允許序列化兩者`Animal`並`Mammal`輸入、 套用欄位兩次，每次指定其中兩個可接受的類型。To allow the to serialize both the `Animal` and `Mammal` type, apply the to the field twice, each time specifying one of the two acceptable types. > [!NOTE] > 您可以套用多個執行個體或指定可插入陣列的物件類型。You can apply multiple instances of the or to specify types of objects that can be inserted into the array. > [!NOTE] > 不支援序列化的欄位或屬性，傳回的介面的陣列。The serialization of a field or property that returns an interface or array of interfaces is not supported. 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 您可以使用 word`XmlArrayItem`代替較長的程式碼中。You can use the word `XmlArrayItem` in your code instead of the longer . ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`，其中包含一個名為欄位`Employees`所傳回的陣列`Employee`物件。The following example serializes a class named `Group` that contains a field named `Employees` that returns an array of `Employee` objects. 範例會在套用欄位，藉此指示它可以將這兩個基底類別的物件 (`Employee`) 型別和衍生的類別型別 (`Manager`) 序列化的陣列。The example applies the to the field, thereby instructing the that it can insert objects of both the base class (`Employee`) type and derived class type (`Manager`) into the serialized array. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Transportation`，其中包含一個名為欄位`MyVehicles`所傳回的陣列`Vehicle`物件。The following example serializes a class named `Transportation` that contains a field named `MyVehicles` that returns an array of `Vehicle` objects. 範例會在套用 欄位中，以允許要插入的執行個體`Car`類別，衍生自`Vehicle`類別，陣列中的。The example applies the to the field, allowing the to insert instances of the `Car` class, which is derived from the `Vehicle` class, into the array. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載設定屬性。This overload sets the property. 如果您想要不同的成員識別碼產生的 XML 項目的名稱，請使用此多載。Use this overload if you want the name of the generated XML element to differ from the member's identifier. 包含命名空間的 XML 文件可以包含多個版本的項目名稱。An XML document that includes namespaces can contain more than one version of an element name. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性。For details, see the property. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Transportation`，其中包含一個名為欄位`MyVehicles`所傳回的陣列`Vehicle`物件。The following example serializes a class named `Transportation` that contains a field named `MyVehicles` that returns an array of `Vehicle` objects. 範例會在套用 欄位中，以允許要插入的執行個體`Car`類別，衍生自`Vehicle`類別，陣列中的。The example applies the to the field, allowing the to insert instances of the `Car` class, which is derived from the `Vehicle` class, into the array. 同時套用屬性，此範例會設定屬性使用`elementName`參數。While applying the attribute, the example sets the property using the `elementName` parameter. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個多載而屬性。This overload sets the and the properties. 如果您想要不同的成員識別碼產生的 XML 項目的名稱，請使用此多載。Use this overload if you want the name of the generated XML element to differ from the member's identifier. 包含命名空間的 XML 文件可以包含多個版本的項目名稱。An XML document that includes namespaces can contain more than one version of an element name. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性。For details, see the property. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Transportation`，其中包含一個名為欄位`MyVehicles`所傳回的陣列`Vehicle`物件。The following example serializes a class named `Transportation` that contains a field named `MyVehicles` that returns an array of `Vehicle` objects. 範例會在套用 欄位中，以允許要插入的執行個體`Car`類別，衍生自`Vehicle`類別，陣列中的。The example applies the to the field, allowing the to insert instances of the `Car` class, which is derived from the `Vehicle` class, into the array. 同時套用屬性，此範例會設定屬性使用`elementName`參數，而屬性使用`type`參數。While applying the attribute, the example sets the property using the `elementName` parameter, and the property using the `type` parameter. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute3 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute3 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.XmlArrayItemAttribute3 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定產生的 XML 項目的 XML 資料型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML data type of the generated XML element.

value.span: XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 資料型別，如全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org ) 文件＜XML Schema Part 2: DataTypes＞中所定義。

span.span: An XML schema definition (XSD) data type, as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document "XML Schema Part 2: DataTypes".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出與及其.NET 對等項目之 XML 結構描述簡單資料類型。The following table lists the XML Schema simple data types with their .NET equivalents. XML 結構描述`base64Binary`並`hexBinary`資料類型使用的陣列物件，並套用使用屬性設為"base64Binary 」 或 「 hexBinary"，視需要。For the XML Schema `base64Binary` and `hexBinary` data types, use an array of objects, and apply an with the property set to "base64Binary" or "hexBinary", as appropriate. XML 結構描述`time`並`date`資料類型，使用型別並套用使用設為 「 日期 」 或 「 時間 」。For the XML Schema `time` and `date` data types, use the type and apply the with the set to "date" or "time". 對應至字串，每一個 XML 結構描述型別，套用具有其屬性設定為 XML 結構描述型別。For every XML Schema type that is mapped to a string, apply the with its property set to the XML Schema type. 不過，這不會變更序列化格式，只有該成員的結構描述。However, this does not change the serialization format, only the schema for the member. > [!NOTE] > 因此您必須將它設定為其中一個 XML 結構描述資料型別完全區分大小寫屬性。The property is case-sensitive, so you must set it exactly to one of the XML Schema data types. > [!NOTE] > 將二進位資料做為 XML 項目會更有效率的再將它傳遞為 XML 屬性。Passing binary data as an XML element is more efficient then passing it as an XML attribute. 如需 XML 結構描述資料類型的詳細資訊，請參閱全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org) 文件 「 XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料類型。 」For more information about XML Schema data types, see the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes." |XSD 資料型別XSD data type|.NET 資料類型.NET data type| |-------------------|--------------------| |anyURIanyURI|| |base64Binarybase64Binary|陣列物件Array of objects| |booleanboolean|| |bytebyte|| |datedate|| |dateTimedateTime|| |decimaldecimal|| |doubledouble|| |ENTITYENTITY|| |實體ENTITIES|| |floatfloat|| |gDaygDay|| |gMonthgMonth|| |gMonthDaygMonthDay|| |gYeargYear|| |gYearMonthgYearMonth|| |hexBinaryhexBinary|陣列物件Array of objects| |識別碼ID|| |IDREFIDREF|| |IDREFSIDREFS|| |intint|| |整數integer|| |語言language|| |longlong|| |名稱Name|| |NCNameNCName|| |negativeIntegernegativeInteger|| |NMTOKENNMTOKEN|| |NMTOKENSNMTOKENS|| |normalizedStringnormalizedString|| |nonNegativeIntegernonNegativeInteger|| |nonPositiveIntegernonPositiveInteger|| |NOTATIONNOTATION|| |positiveIntegerpositiveInteger|| |QNameQName|| |持續期間duration|| |字串string|| |shortshort|| |時間time|| |tokentoken|| |unsignedByteunsignedByte|| |unsignedIntunsignedInt|| |unsignedLongunsignedLong|| |unsignedShortunsignedShort|| ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`PurchaseOrder`。The following example serializes a class named `PurchaseOrder`. 數個執行個體類別會套用至三個成員，而每個執行個體的屬性設定為允許在陣列中的型別。Several instances of the class are applied to three members, and the property for each instance is set to a type allowed in the array. [!code-cpp[XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/CPP/arrayitem.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/CS/arrayitem.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlArrayItemAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlArrayItemAttribute Example/VB/arrayitem.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定產生的 XML 項目的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the generated XML element.

value.span: 產生的 XML 項目的名稱。

span.span: The name of the generated XML element.
The default is the member identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定如果您想要不同的成員識別碼產生的 XML 項目的名稱。Specify an if you want the name of the generated XML element to differ from the member's identifier. 您可以設定為相同名為成員的多個類別成員，如果產生的 XML 文件會使用 XML 命名空間來區別具有相同的值。You can set the same value to more than one class member if the generated XML document uses XML namespaces to distinguish between identically named members. 如需有關如何使用 XML 文件中的命名空間和前置詞的名稱的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For details about how to use namespaces and prefixed names in the XML document, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例會設定屬性`Vehicle`並`Car`類別，藉此變更的 XML 項目名稱，產生這些類別。The following example sets the property for the `Vehicle` and `Car` class--thereby changing the names of XML elements that the generates for those classes. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出產生的 XML 項目名稱是否為限定的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the name of the generated XML element is qualified.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定是否 XML 項目名稱為限定，根據全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org) 規格 」 中的命名空間。 」The property determines whether an XML element name is qualified, based on the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) specification "Namespaces in XML." 如果屬性設定為任何值時，嘗試設定屬性設`XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`會擲回例外狀況。If the property is set to any value, attempting to set the property to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified` throws an exception. 預設值`XmlSchemaForm.None`，會指示檢查 XML 文件，以判斷是否為限定的命名空間的結構描述。The default value, `XmlSchemaForm.None`, instructs the to check the schema for the XML document to determine whether the namespace is qualified. 項目，如會檢查結構描述項目屬性的值`elementFormDefault`。For elements, the checks the value of the schema-element attribute `elementFormDefault`. 針對屬性，它會檢查結構描述項目屬性的值`attributeFormDefault`。For attributes, it checks the value of the schema-element attribute `attributeFormDefault`. 例如，下列 XML 結構描述指出`Name`元素為限定，而`Number`項目是不合格。For example, the following XML Schema indicates that the `Name` element is qualified, while the `Number` element is unqualified. ``` ``` ## Examples 下列範例會設定屬性`Vehicle`類別，即可`XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`，而屬性`Car`類別`XmlSchemaForm.Qualified`。The following example sets the property for the `Vehicle` class to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`, and the property for the `Car` class to `XmlSchemaForm.Qualified`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Form Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 屬性設定為 ，並且指定 值。

span.span: The property is set to and a value is specified.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsNullable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsNullable : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 是否必須將成員序列化為 屬性設為 的空 XML 標記。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the must serialize a member as an empty XML tag with the attribute set to .

value.span: 如果 產生 屬性，則為 ，否則為 ，而且不會產生執行個體。

span.span: if the generates the attribute; otherwise, , and no instance is generated.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構的 XML 結構描述規格允許明確指示項目的內容遺漏 XML 文件。The XML schema specification for structures allows an XML document to explicitly signal that an element's content is missing. 這類項目包含屬性`xsi:nil`設定為`true`。Such an element contains the attribute `xsi:nil` set to `true`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org) 規格標題為 「 XML 結構描述第 1 部分： 結構。 」For more information, see the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) specification titled "XML Schema Part 1: Structures." 如果屬性是`true`，則`xsi:nil`屬性就會產生已設成的類別成員的`null`。If the property is `true`, the `xsi:nil` attribute is generated for class members that have been set to `null`. 例如，如果您設定一個名為欄位`MyStringArray`要`null`，則會產生下列 XML 程式碼。For example, if you set a field named `MyStringArray` to `null`, the generates the following XML code. ``` ``` 如果屬性是`false`，就會產生任何 XML 元素。If the property is `false`, no XML element is generated. > [!NOTE] > 您不能套用成員的屬性型別為實值型別，因為實值型別不能包含`null`。You cannot apply the property to a member typed as a value type because a value type cannot contain `null`. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`，其中包含一個名為欄位`Employees`所傳回的陣列`Employee`物件。The following example serializes a class named `Group`, which contains a field named `Employees` that returns an array of `Employee` objects. 名為第二個類別`Manager`衍生自`Employee`。A second class named `Manager` derives from `Employee`. 指定可以插入兩者`Employee`和`Manager`陣列中的物件。An specifies that the can insert both `Employee` and `Manager` objects into the array. 範例會設定屬性，藉此告訴不是用來產生`xsi:nil`陣列中的屬性物件設為`null`。The example sets the property, thereby telling the not to generate the `xsi:nil` attribute objects in the array set to `null`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.IsNullable Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定產生的 XML 項目之的命名空間。

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace of the generated XML element.

value.span: 產生的 XML 項目的命名空間。

span.span: The namespace of the generated XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是否符合全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org) 規格 」 中的命名空間。 」The property conforms to the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) specification "Namespaces in XML." 若要建立要用於 XML 文件和相關聯的前置詞的命名空間，您必須建立，其中包含所有前置詞和命名空間配對。To create namespaces to use in the XML document and associated prefixes, you must create an that contains all the prefix and namespace pairs. 設定每個命名空間必須包含在。The namespace you set for each must be contained in the . 當產生文件中，正確前置詞的項目名稱，針對每個陣列項目。When the generates the document, it correctly prefixes the element name for each array item. ## Examples 下列範例會套用，並設定屬性。The following example applies an and sets the property. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 影響的 XML 項目的階層架構中的層級。

span.span: Gets or sets the level in a hierarchy of XML elements that the affects.

value.span: 在陣列組成之陣列的一組索引中，以零起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of a set of indexes in an array of arrays.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 文件可以包含階層的 XML 項目。An XML document can contain hierarchies of XML elements. 若要表示這類階層，可使用陣列的陣列。To represent such a hierarchy, an array of arrays is used. 在這類陣列中，每個索引代表階層中的層級。In such an array, each index represents a level in the hierarchy. 因此，屬性只會套用時至傳回陣列的陣列的欄位。Therefore, the property is only used when applying an to a field that returns an array of arrays. 當套用屬性，指定這個屬性會影響設定的階層層級。When applying the attribute, specify which hierarchy level the attribute affects by setting the . 第一個索引一律會有值為 0;因此它是選擇性的以設定其--而不需要值套用至第一個的陣列索引。The first index always has the value of 0; therefore it is optional to set its --an without a value is applied to the first array index. 只有後續物件，可能需要指定 （為 1、 2、 3，依此類推） 的值。Only the subsequent objects require values specified (as 1, 2, 3, and so forth). ## Examples 下列範例會套用三個屬性加入陣列的陣列。The following example applies three attributes to an array of arrays. 若要指定適用於每個屬性，其中的陣列屬性設定為陣列的索引。To specify which of the arrays each attribute applies to, the property is set to the index of the arrays. [!code-cpp[NestingLevel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NestingLevel/cpp/nestinglevel.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NestingLevel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NestingLevel/CS/nestinglevel.cs#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定陣列中允許的型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the type allowed in an array.
A that is allowed in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定覆寫的型別公用欄位或公用讀取/寫入屬性值。Use the property to specify an overridden type for a public field or public read/write property value. 如果欄位或屬性會傳回類型的陣列，適用於多個執行個體欄位或屬性。If a field or property returns an array of type , apply multiple instances of the to the field or property. 每一個執行個體，可插入陣列的物件類型的屬性。For each instance, set the property to a type of object that can be inserted into the array. 如果陣列包含只基本型別，您不需要套用。If an array contains only primitive types, you do not need to apply the . 根據預設，會產生一系列，具有相同的項目名稱，每個元素，每個值，但每個元素的類型是設定為 XML 結構描述資料型別。By default, the generates a series of elements, each with the same element name, for each value, but the type of each element is set to the XML Schema data type. 例如，下列程式碼：For example, the following code: ``` ' Visual Basic code Public Class Arrays Public XSDTypes ()As Object= New Object(){"one", 2, 3.0} End Class // C# code public class MyArray{ // No XmlArrayItemAttribute is applied. public object[] XSDTypes= new object[]{"one", 2, 3.2}; } ``` 此 XML 中的結果：results in this XML: ``` ``` 不過，如果您指定使用.NET 型別名稱產生的每個基本型別，而每個值的項目名稱的屬性。However, if you specify the property for each primitive type, the element name for each value is generated using the .NET type name. 例如此程式碼：For example this code: ``` ' Visual Basic code Public Class Arrays _ Public PrimitiveTypes () As Object = New Object(){"one", 2, 3.0} End Class // C# code public class Arrays{ [XmlArrayItem(typeof(string))] [XmlArrayItem(typeof(int))] [XmlArrayItem(typeof(double))] public object [] PrimitiveTypes = new object[]{"one", 2, 3.0}; } ``` 此 XML 中的結果：results in this XML: ``` one 2 3 ``` ## Examples 下列範例會將序列化物件的陣列。The following example serializes an array of objects. 傳回陣列的欄位屬性具有兩個執行個體。The field that returns the array is attributed with two instances. 每個執行個體的指示接受指定陣列中。Each instance instructs the to accept the specified in the array. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayItemAttribute.Type Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
